task.name: Task 1: Design your App Wireframes
task.description:
Is always a good practice to design first before start coding. The objective of this task is to create the Task planner app wireframes to understand how it will work and look.
Is always a good practice to design first before start coding. The objective of this task is to create the Task planner app wireframes to understand how it will work and look.

 Is always a good practice to design first before start coding. The objective of this task is to create the Task planner app wireframes to understand how it will work and look.

task.name: Task 2: Implement your Wireframes using Bootstrap
task.description: Implement the basic HTML structure of your Wireframes design.

task.name: Task 3: Create a Task Card layout and a Task List component
task.description:
Implement the card layout bootstrap component that contains the task information:

Name
Description
AssignedTo
DueDate
Status

task.name: Task 4: Adding Tasks
task.description: For this task, we'll be creating a class to manage the tasks, adding a method to the class to keep track of tasks in our application, and connecting up the New Task form to create tasks.

task.name: Task 5: Display The Tasks
task.description: For this task, we'll be writing the code to display the TaskManager's tasks array on the page.

task.name: Task 6: Task Form Inputs Validation
task.description: Implement a form that captures the fields required to create a task.

task.name: Task 7: Update A Task
task.description:
For this task, we'll write the code to update a task's status to "DONE" once a "Mark As Done" button on the task is clicked.

Note, for this task, we are not using the "Update Task" form. This is part of the re-structuring of the project. This step will be added as a stretch goal to the end of the course.

task.name: Task 8: Persisting Tasks to LocalStorage
task.description: In this task, we'll persist (ie: save) our tasks to LocalStorage, so that we can load them again the next time we visit our page.

task.name: Task 9: Deleting Tasks
task.description: Now that we are persisting tasks to localStorage, we need a way to delete old tasks so that they don't fill up the list over time.

task.name: Task 10: Test TaskManager
task.description:
Description
In our final task, we'll test our TaskManager class using Mocha.
